My Work

Recipe Web Application

This is a project I completed as part of a tutorial from a teacher I follow online. The original project was done with node.js, PostgreSQL, and dust.js templating engine. I decided to implement this same project using MongoDB and handlebars.js. The recipe app has full CRUD functionality (create, update, and delete). Full code can be seen in the github link.
